summary: This is an email from November 4, 2020, regarding a request for assistance from FBI Squad C-20 for the Maxwell investigation. The request seeks two volunteer agents to show digital evidence to Maxwell and her defense team at MDC on November 6, 2020.

persons.name: Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the investigation; digital evidence is to be shown to her and her defense team at MDC.

events.title: Scheduled evidence review at MDC
events.description: Two volunteer FBI agents are requested to show digital evidence to Maxwell and her defense team at the Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC).

keyFacts: FBI Squad C-20 requested assistance for the Maxwell investigation on November 4, 2020.
Two volunteer agents were needed to show digital evidence to Maxwell and her defense team on November 6, 2020, from 8:00 am to 3:00 pm.
The evidence was digital, requiring a laptop and hard drive for presentation.
The email indicates ongoing legal proceedings and evidence discovery in the Maxwell case as of late 2020.
